dmca.title: Cisco Demands Removal of Messages Offering Source Code
dmca.body:
11/05/2004 11:55 FAX	ORRICK	002/065

O R R I C K
ORRICK, HERRINGTON & SUTCLIFFE LLP 
[redacted]
tel [redacted] 
fax [redacted]
www.ORRICK.COM

November 5, 2004
U.S. MAIL AND FACSIMILE [redacted]

Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints 
[redacted]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re: Public Internet Posting of Confidential and Copyrighted Cisco Information 

Dear Sir or Madam:

	I am an attorney representing Cisco Systems, Inc. and Cisco Technology, Inc. (collectively "Cisco"). On behalf of my client Cisco, I hereby submit the following notice of copyright infringement ("Notice") pursuant to 17 U.S.C. - 512(c)(3). I am also providing notice that Cisco's trade secrets are being made available on Google's website without Cisco's authorization. Under penalty of perjury, I submit that I am authorized to act on behalf of Cisco with regard to the alleged copyright infringement and trade secret misappropriation described herein. 

This letler advises you that the following Google Group sites are currently posting and offering to sell Cisco copyrighted and trade secret material:

- http://groups.google.com/groups?dq=&hl=en&lr=&group=alt.gap.international.sales&selm=15d5a 144.0410312327.1d76e134%40posting.google.com

- http://groups.google.com/groups?dq=&hl=en&lr=&group=alt.gap.international.
sales&selm=15d5a144.0410312330.660789ff%40posting.google.com

We have also identified these sites by the following Google "Message-ID" numbers:

- Message-ID:<15d5a144.0410312330.660789ff@posting.google.com
- Message-ID:<15d5a144.0410312327.1d76e134@posting.google.com

We request that you immediately remove these messages and links from your website.

[redacted] 
[redacted] [redacted]@orrick.com

DOCSSVI:285404A

11/05/2004 11:56 FAX	ORRICK	 003/065

O R R I C K

[redacted] 
November 5, 2004 
Page 2

As of November 4, 2004, a user, customer, or subscriber on your network was offering for download over the internet files containing the following copyrighted and trade secret material which is owned by Cisco:
-  Cisco Pix 6.3.1-release source code.

This trade secret and copyrighted material were posted at the above-identified web addresses and Google "Message-ID" numbers. Enclosed for your records are print outs of these messages. I have a good faith belief that the posting and offer for sale of Cisco copyrighted ar d trade secret materials on Google's Group sites were not authorized by Cisco, its agents, or the law, and assert that the information in this letter is accurate, based on information presently available to me. We therefore expect Google to comply with this Notice and remove these messages and links immediately.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. If you have any questions, please contact me at [redacted] or at [redacted]@orrick.com at your earliest convenience.

Very truly yours,
[redacted]

INC:llb
Enclosures
cc:	[redacted], Cisco Systems, Inc. 
[redacted], Google, Inc.

DOCSSVI:285404.1

11/05/2004 11:56 FAX	ORRICK	 004/065

From: [redacted] ([redacted]@mighty.co.za) 
Subject: SCC Newsletter #2
Newsgroups: alt.gap.international.sales 
Date: 2004-10-31 23:27:22 PST 

Search Result 2

This is the only article in this thread View: Original Format

SOURCE CODE CLUB NEWSLETTER #2 - November 1, 2004 

TABLE OF CONTENTS
1) Contact Information
2) News
3) Buy
4) FAQ
5) About

Contact Information Two ways to contact us:

1) Post a PGP message encrypted with our public key via usenet to: alt . gap. international. sales This method of contact is preferred.

2) Send email to: [redacted]@rediffmail.com

THE EMAIL COULD CHANGE OR GO DOWN. If you absolutely must get a message to SCC, we recommend using usenet. The SCC PGP public key is located on full disclosure mailing list archives, usenet, and the end of this newsletter. It is wise to make sure they all match, for your safety. This public key will NEVER change. Only PGP encrypted email will be responded to.
dmca.principal_name: Cisco Systems, Inc. and Cisco Technology, Inc.
